title: Autism-Friendly Travel
description: Autism-friendly travel services and resources help families navigate the challenges of traveling with individuals on the autism spectrum by providing accommodations, planning assistance, and sensory-friendly experiences. Many theme parks, museums, and tourist attractions in Florida offer special accommodations such as quiet spaces, advance planning materials, and expedited access programs. Several organizations provide travel training, social stories for travel preparation, and coordination with hotels and transportation services. These services recognize the unique needs of travelers with autism including sensory sensitivities, routine requirements, and communication differences.
